overview.tax_residency_rules: Residency is determined by physical presence in Tanzania for 183 days or more in a tax year.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Personal allowances and deductions are available.
personal_income_tax.social_security: Social security is included in personal income tax.

corporate_tax.deductions: Business expenses, depreciation, and certain investment incentives.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.
capital_gains_tax.short_term_capital_gains: Capital gains held for less than one year are taxed at the rates under personal or corporate income tax.
capital_gains_tax.long_term_capital_gains: Capital gains held for more than one year are taxed at a flat rate of 20%.

property_tax.rate: 15% of assessed property value for urban areas and 10% for rural areas.
property_tax.exemptions: Property used for residential purposes is exempt for the first TZS 50,000,000.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Must meet certain income and insurance requirements.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: May be eligible for tax exemptions and incentives.

special_economic_zones.name: Bagamoyo Special Economic Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Tax holidays, reduced corporate tax rates, and duty-free imports.

special_economic_zones.name: Kigamboni Special Economic Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Tax holidays, reduced corporate tax rates, and duty-free imports.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Prevents double taxation on income and capital gains.
Prevents double taxation on income and dividends.

additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 141st in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
